marketing.title: Build your SaaS in minutes with NextKit
marketing.description: Dive into the NextJS boilerplate – your toolkit for crafting SaaS, AI wonders, or any cool web app, and speedily pocket your first online bucks!

features.title: Features
features.description: Explore the latest features and tutorials on NextKit.
features.nextjs-description: App dir, Routing, Layouts, Loading UI 和 API routes.
features.react-description: Server and Client Components. Use hook.
features.database-description: ORM using Prisma and deployed on Neon.tech.
features.components-description: UI components built using shadcn/ui and styled with Tailwind CSS.
features.subscriptions-description: Free and paid subscriptions using Stripe.
features.blog: NextKit also includes a blog and a full-featured documentation site built using Velite and MDX.

boost.title: Boost your app to the next level in a flash and watch the $$ roll in!
boost.ad-1: Whiz through user logins, payments, and emails like a pro.
boost.ad-2: Spend less time wrangling APIs and more on your startup masterpiece.
boost.ad-3: NextKit hands you the perfect boilerplate to launch at warp speed!
